scripts.generate:api-client: npm run rm:nexa-api-client && ./node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli generate -i https://api-dev.amazingkids.app/dev/api-spec -g typescript-fetch -o ./src/ak-api-client && git add . && npm run lint-staged
scripts.generate:api-client:local-spec: npm run rm:nexa-api-client && npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./api-spec.yml -g typescript-fetch -o ./src/nexa-api-client && git add . && npm run lint-staged
